alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 12:48AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Miami, Linn, southeastern Johnson and western Bates Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1248 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Garnett to La Harpe. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Paola, Spring Hill, Osawatomie, Louisburg, Pleasanton, La Cygne, Mound City, Drexel, Linn Valley, Hume, Parker, Blue Mound, Prescott, Fontana, Amsterdam, Amoret, Merwin and Worland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
